black.content: I like to celebrate the new year with _.
I can't wait for the harvest festival! I heard there's going to be _ this year!
_. The real reason for the season.

white: Loudly confessing your sins in public.
Cleansing the world of sin with natural disasters.
Angels interfering in an otherwise fair game.
Using the sacred texts out of context to support my personal agenda.
Seeing omens in every event and action.
Participating in every religion just to cover all the bases.

pack.name: Generic Genre Deck: Religion & Holiday Expansion
